languages.text: "Кормчей душ не пристало переживать из-за обманов выродков-нелюдей. Страх — трещина в броне душе, и сквозь нее может проникнуть клякса скверны, что запачкает сердце и ум!"

"The Helmswoman of the Soul Sea should not be troubled by the deceptions of inhuman miscreants. Fear means a crack in your soul's armour — and a speck of corruption can slip through that crack and besmirch your heart and mind!"
languages.original_text: "Кормчей душ не пристало переживать из-за обманов выродков-нелюдей. Страх — трещина в броне душе, и сквозь нее может проникнуть клякса скверны, что запачкает сердце и ум!"

traits.locale_text: "The Helmswoman of the Soul Sea should not be troubled by the deceptions of inhuman miscreants. Fear means a crack in your soul's armour — and a speck of corruption can slip through that crack and besmirch your heart and mind!"

"The Helmswoman of the Soul Sea should not be troubled by the deceptions of inhuman miscreants. Fear means a crack in your soul's armour — and a speck of corruption can slip through that crack and besmirch your heart and mind!"

"The Helmswoman of the Soul Sea should not be troubled by the deceptions of inhuman miscreants. Fear means a crack in your soul's armour — and a speck of corruption can slip through that crack and besmirch your heart and mind!"

"The Helmswoman of the Soul Sea should not be troubled by the deceptions of inhuman miscreants. Fear means a crack in your soul's armour — and a speck of corruption can slip through that crack and besmirch your heart and mind!"

languages.text: “灵魂之海的舵手不应该被那些非人异端的骗术所困扰。恐惧会在你灵魂盔甲上留下裂缝，哪怕是最细微的腐化都能从那道裂缝钻进去，玷污你的心灵和思想！”
languages.original_text: "The Helmswoman of the Soul Sea should not be troubled by the deceptions of inhuman miscreants. Fear means a crack in your soul's armour — and a speck of corruption can slip through that crack and besmirch your heart and mind!"

traits.locale_text: “灵魂之海的舵手不应该被那些非人异端的骗术所困扰。恐惧会在你灵魂盔甲上留下裂缝，哪怕是最细微的腐化都能从那道裂缝钻进去，玷污你的心灵和思想！”

languages.text: « La timonière de la Mer des âmes ne devrait pas se soucier de la vermine non-humaine. Si la peur vient fêler ne serait-ce qu'un peu l'armure de votre âme, la corruption risquerait d'en profiter pour s'installer et envahir aussi bien votre cœur que votre esprit ! »
languages.original_text: "The Helmswoman of the Soul Sea should not be troubled by the deceptions of inhuman miscreants. Fear means a crack in your soul's armour — and a speck of corruption can slip through that crack and besmirch your heart and mind!"

traits.locale_text: « La timonière de la Mer des âmes ne devrait pas se soucier de la vermine inhumaine. Si la peur vient fêler ne serait-ce qu'un peu l'armure de votre âme, la corruption risquerait d'en profiter pour s'installer et envahir aussi bien votre cœur que votre esprit ! »

languages.text: «Timonel del mar de las almas, no debe dejar que los engaños de los inhumanos la perturben. El miedo es una grieta en la armadura de su alma, ¡y una pizca de corrupción puede colarse por esa grieta para manchar su corazón y su mente!».
languages.original_text: "The Helmswoman of the Soul Sea should not be troubled by the deceptions of inhuman miscreants. Fear means a crack in your soul's armour — and a speck of corruption can slip through that crack and besmirch your heart and mind!"

traits.locale_text: «Timonel del mar de las almas, no debe dejar que los engaños de los inhumanos la perturben. El miedo es una grieta en la armadura de su alma, ¡y una pizca de corrupción puede colarse por esa grieta para manchar su corazón y su mente!».

languages.text: 「魂の海の操舵手は、非人間的な悪漢の欺瞞に悩まされるべきではない。恐怖は魂の鎧に亀裂が入ることを意味し、腐敗の一片がその亀裂をすり抜け、心と精神を汚すからな！」
languages.original_text: "The Helmswoman of the Soul Sea should not be troubled by the deceptions of inhuman miscreants. Fear means a crack in your soul's armour — and a speck of corruption can slip through that crack and besmirch your heart and mind!"

traits.locale_text: 「魂の海の操舵手は、非人間的な悪漢の欺瞞に悩まされるべきではない。恐怖は魂の鎧に亀裂が入ることを意味し、腐敗の一片がその亀裂をすり抜け、心と精神を汚すからな！」

languages.text: "Die Steuerfrau des Seelenmeers sollte sich von den Täuschungen unmenschlicher Bösewichte nicht peinigen lassen. Angst bedeutet einen Riss in der Rüstung Eurer Seele. Und ein kleiner Fleck der Korruption kann durch diesen Riss eindringen und Euer Herz und Euren Verstand vergiften!"
languages.original_text: "The Helmswoman of the Soul Sea should not be troubled by the deceptions of inhuman miscreants. Fear means a crack in your soul's armour — and a speck of corruption can slip through that crack and besmirch your heart and mind!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Steuerfrau des Seelenmeers sollte sich von den Täuschungen unmenschlicher Bösewichte nicht peinigen lassen. Angst bedeutet einen Riss in der Rüstung Eurer Seele. Und ein kleiner Fleck der Korruption kann durch diesen Riss eindringen und Euer Herz und Euren Verstand vergiften!"

languages.original_text: "The Helmswoman of the Soul Sea should not be troubled by the deceptions of inhuman miscreants. Fear means a crack in your soul's armour — and a speck of corruption can slip through that crack and besmirch your heart and mind!"

languages.text: "Ruh Denizi Serdümeni, insan dışı kâfirlerin aldatmacalarıyla canını sıkmamalı. Korku, ruhun zırhında açılmış bir yarık gibidir. Bir parça yozlaşma bu yarıktan içeri sızsa kalbini ve zihnini kirletebilir!"
languages.original_text: "The Helmswoman of the Soul Sea should not be troubled by the deceptions of inhuman miscreants. Fear means a crack in your soul's armour — and a speck of corruption can slip through that crack and besmirch your heart and mind!"

traits.locale_text: "Ruh Denizi Serdümeni, insan dışı kâfirlerin aldatmacalarıyla canını sıkmamalı. Korku, ruhun zırhında açılmış bir yarık gibidir. Bir parça yozlaşma bu yarıktan içeri sızsa kalbini ve zihnini kirletebilir!"
